title: Define operations to do in specific breakpoints using GDB
content:
In 
gdbinit
I defined some breakpoints. How can I do that when specific breakpoint called I want to run 
x/s $r1
?

answers_data.content:
I think your question is similar to an old (solved) thread on stackoverflow:

https://stackoverflow.com/questions/6517423/how-to-do-an-specific-action-when-a-certain-breakpoint-is-hit-in-gdb
